name: DESIGN YOUR OWN Beaded Wire Wrapped Wedding Cake Serving Set & Toasting Flutes
description:
Inspired by couture style and chic designs, this glamorous beaded wire wrapped wedding cake serving set and toasting flutes will glamourize your special event! Great gift for the unique, chic and classy bride-to-be.

DESIGN YOUR OWN: Available in multiple colors of beads & wire. Make your perfect day, PERFECT! Convo me at couturetable@gmail.com your wedding day colors & I will custom make these to match! -ox

Intricately wire wrapped with non tarnishing stainless steel wire to give it's crystal effect. Adorned with beautiful glass beads and rhinestone accents. 

Measures approx. Cake knife: 14" and server is approx. 11"
Champagn Flutes: 8 1/2" tall

Want to look at more? check out our website at www.couturetable.com!

Thank you for looking! 

Cheers,
Donna

name: Turquiose and Copper Coffee Lover's Coffee Measuring Spoon
description:
Inspired by couture style and chic designs, this turquiose beaded wire wrapped coffee lover's coffee spoon will delight anyone who's heart is with their mochas and lattes. One end measures 1 tablespoon and the other end measures 2 tablespoons. This is a great gift for anyone that loves unique, chic and sassy items in their kitchen.

Measures approx: 7 3/4" 

I've intricately wrapped copper wire around the handle of this measuring spoon with a ton of turquiose colored stone beads.


Want more to look at? Check out our website: www.couturetable.com

Special Order: This item can be special ordered in multiple colors and in sets. Please email me if you are interested in something specially made for you!

Thank you for looking!

Cheers, 
Donna

name: Black, Gold and Silver Beaded Wire Wrapped Salad Serving Set
description:
Inspired by high fashion and chic designs, this black, gold and silver beaded wire wrapped salad serving set brings elegance to the dinner table. Serve your guests with some luxury couture style entertaining. Great gift idea for anyone who is chic and classy! 

Intricately wire wrapped with non-tarnishing brass wire. Adorned with various black, gold and silver glass beads. I use restaurant grade stainless steel serving ware. Sold as a set of 2.

Dimensions: Both pieces are approx. 12 1/2" in length. 

Back to my Etsy shop: www.couturetable.etsy.com

Want more to look at? Check out our website: www.couturetable.com
